abstract: South African appeals court overturns manslaughter conviction of Olympic athlete Oscar Pistorious, finding him guilty of 2013 murder of girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp; cites lower court's errors in legal interpretation and handling of evidence in new conviction, which carries minimum prison sentence of 15 years.
lead_paragraph: South Africa’s top appeals court overturned an earlier manslaughter conviction for the Olympic star in the 2013 killing of his girlfriend.

headline.main: Oscar Pistorius Guilty in Murder of Reeva Steenkamp, Appeals Court Rules
headline.print_headline: South African Appeals Court Convicts Pistorius of Murder

snippet: South Africa’s top appeals court overturned an earlier manslaughter conviction for the Olympic star in the 2013 killing of his girlfriend.
